storyInfo: Blitz enters the Foehn Hotlands via Sargon. This trip has exhausted both his body and mind, but it has also let him figure some things out.

attributes.content: Sargon
Edge of the foehn hotlands
Hello, sir.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Sir?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Leave me alone. I've got no interest in talking to you.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Maybe you could sell me some food or water?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: (Squints, stares at Blitz)
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Oh, I see, you're a mercenary.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: There's nothing in our village except hot wind and sand. What did you come here for?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I'm preparing to head south.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: South? Ha, your brain must be cooked.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: That's the foehn hotlands down there.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: It's exactly where I'm going.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: (Looks over Blitz once again)
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: You seem sensible enough to me, no head wounds or anything. What are you killing yourself down there for?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I'm just taking a look. A little bit of exploration.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Let me guess, everyone else drives you away and treats you like a madman?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: That's about right, I'd say.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: You don't want me for anything, then.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I'm buying supplies.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Mister Mercenary, our lives hang on every drop of water and every mouthful of grain in this village.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Money won't get you anything.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I heard from the rest of the villagers, you're the one who does business with other settlements, right?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Ha, who's going to come shopping here?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: (Sargonian slang) I want to buy 'three gold coins.'
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: (Shaky Victorian) I'll need a cake.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: (Sargonian slang) I'll give you a grain of golden sand.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Let's talk inside.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Welcome to Rhodes Island's safehouse, operator.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Err, that's what you people are called, isn't it? Operators.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: It is, it is.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: What do you need?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: As much food and water as possible.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Are you really going into the foehn hotlands?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I've been living in these forsaken parts for over forty years. Never seen anyone take an interest in that place.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: The heat blowing in from there takes its fair share of people.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: And the ones left behind, well, you've seen for yourself.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: They stand outside like statues in the breeze and the shade. They don't even bother to talk.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: If I didn't have my small business, keeping that little bit of contact with the outside, well. I'd be like that too.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Never hurts to go out and take a look, though.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Trust you strangers to care.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Wait there. I've got some stuff your Rhodes Islanders left here.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Drink this first.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Ah, found it.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: First time someone's asked me to work this whole—
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: —(Thickly accented Victorian) 'Safehouse' thing.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: They left some info for anyone who wants to go into the hotlands.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I don't know how to read. You take a look.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: (Standard Victorian) Exploration into the foehn hotlands is not encouraged. If intent on entering, please ensure you bring adequate resources for survival.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: What's it say there?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: They recommend I prepare enough supplies before I enter.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Still no clue why you're so obsessed with going into that damn place.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: (Clicks tongue)
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Well, I've got the water and supplies right here. Per whatever guidelines, I'm meant to provide them to you operators. Take them yourself.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Did you finish that drink I just gave you?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: How do you feel?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Not so giddy now.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I'll fill a canteen with it. When you feel a headache coming on, take a swig.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: But don't drink too much at once. You'll get hallucinations.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: One gold coin altogether.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: One gold coin? Alright.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Eh? No, I—
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: When I get back, I'll probably need you to go and buy a burdenbeast too.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: But this is—
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Buy some more supplies for the return trip. If there's still much left, then please, pick me up whatever local delicacies you choose.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Alright, alright. You strangers are always so lavish with money.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Are you staying here for the night, or do you have other plans?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: I'll be going now.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Very well, brother. I won't keep you.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Oh, right. What should I call you?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Blitz.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: The foehn hotlands, the final stop on Blitz's journey through Sargon.
Greeting him are blistering heat, wild winds and grains of sand.
To Terrans, it's an endless, golden desert smothered in red-hot storms. The extremities of their great land, manifest.
But in Blitz's eyes, it's a starting point for his survey. With enough tenacity and a little good luck for the road, it might just reveal the truth to the adventurer.
Given no one has explored it yet, this desert holds just the tiniest of possibilities.
What if, just maybe, the way home lies within?
Blitz is going to give it a try, at least.
And just like that, I went into the hotlands, and came back out completely unscathed!
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Commendable bravery, bratushka.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I thought I'd marked out all the key danger areas of Terra.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Well. Good work sweeping each one, people.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: So, find anything in the foehn hotlands?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: I was really hoping I could bring you some good news, but it's nothing but sand in there.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Tachanka, Frost, I hear you saw a lot of kooky things in the northern tundra?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: Frost had to deal with those monsters. They're tricky.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I was dying to fight something tangible. At least it'd be proof of life down there.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: But what do the foehn hotlands have?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Sky, squalls, and sand.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: That's all you get.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Not too good for tourism, in my opinion.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Very boring.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: And very lonely, so Blitz thinks.
On that topic. While you were exploring in Sargon, did you visit our old friend?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Old friend?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Ah, yes.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Erm... You mean the new Lord of Long Spring, yes?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Mm-hm.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: She's been doing well, lately.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: After she finished dealing with all those annoying monsters, a new company from Columbia came looking for her.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Doesn't sound like a good thing.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Maylander?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Maylander.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: They offered some very generous conditions, but because of the mess Volvort Kochinski made, Picale rejected a lot of the contract's clauses. All they could agree on was the most basic trade partnership.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Interesting.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Originium ore was Long Spring's primary revenue stream, but the deeper mines got sealed off long ago. We took the shallow ones out when we blew everything up, so there's no more ore coming out of there.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: What else do they have to sell?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: A little something we can thank our friend Alexsandr for.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: What did I do?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: You made a lot of your Russian matryoshka dolls, in your boredom, didn't you?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I did.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I hear the Columbian who came to look around really took a shine to those 'Sargon' handicrafts, so Maylander's people sought an exclusive distribution deal from Picale.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: That...
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: That's ridiculous.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: The locals got a new lease on life. They all became 'traditional' Sargon craftspeople.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: And with the first round of profits, the Lord bought grains suitable for growing in the barrens from the Columbians. She's completely revamped the whole village.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: By the way, she fixed up the old Lord's residence into a garden.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: From our point of view, she's doing pretty well.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: And—
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Is Dr. Miarow's grave... still there?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: The marker's been worn down by the wind. It's started to crumble already.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I swept it and left some flowers for him, and asked the locals to build a small canopy to keep the wind off.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I imagine somewhere in another world, he's doing just fine.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Alright. That's good.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: (Clears throat)
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Overall, Sargon's a very interesting place.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: The way their language develops is unlike any other country I've been to.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Though they're from the same land, the differences between their races mean they all have diverging accents.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Some tones only show up among certain races, and are practically never reproduced among the rest.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Unless—they become lizards.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Or other strange creatures.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: You've got a very unusual focus.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: It's my specialty.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Speaking of languages, I passed through a very special place in my trip across Sargon.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Acahualla.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: A... ca... halla?
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: It's Acahualla. It's where that Archosauria lady from the Medical Department comes from.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Gavial. I heard about her.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I never knew I'd find such a paradise in Sargon.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Shame how 'overly passionate' the Archosauria are there. They don't even bother to speak, if they can communicate with their fists.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I had to use my shield so much, eventually, bang! It broke.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: All I could do was fasten some stun grenades to some wood and make a temporary shield before I left Acahualla.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: That's funny.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: There's plenty of unique prey in the rainforest. You'd like it there, Tina.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Mealtime's about over.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Do you all have any plans for the afternoon?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: I think I might need to visit HR for a new uniform.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: The sands of Sargon managed to rough up my whole set.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I won't even be able to serve as a specialist operator anymore, if I keep on wearing it.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: You can find me just by following the trail of sand I leave behind.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: What a tragedy.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Fine.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: In that case, two hours from now, we convene on the Rhodes Island training grounds. Objections, anyone?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: None.
attributes.name: Everyone

attributes.content: Been a long while since we did our daily training as a team.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Let's hope we all still remember the essentials of confrontation drills.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Dismissed. We'll meet in two hours.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: See you later, everyone.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Let's get going, then, Blitz.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Lots of work still waiting for you today.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Rhodes Island
Team Rainbow Provisional Dormitory
New uniform, new equipment. That just about does it.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Let's have a look—
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Blitz looks at himself in the dormitory's mirror.
In this span of time, he's traveled through Sargon alone, searching for any clues that could lead home.
From Sargon's prosperous cities, to the lush jungles of Acahualla, not one place could hold him back in his search.
But the foehn hotlands were the exception.
There, time itself seemed to be ruled by the golden sands.
A day, two days, ten.
The scenery before his eyes never once changed.
So he strode on through the sand.
Nothing to show for it.
Fear came to him.
He wasn't sure when he made the decision to turn back. There, as second after second went by, going forward or falling back practically felt no different.
His sense of survival only returned to him once he was back at the safehouse, on the edge of the hotlands.
Instantly, exhaustion broke over him like a tide.
Every time he recalls it, he feels the fear welling up.
How are you? Is everything okay?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: You can get your fill of shooting in a while.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Mm-hm.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I'll go on ahead, then.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: (Pats Blitz on the shoulder)
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: The familiar voice pulls him out from his imagination, back to reality.
He stares at the modified gun in his hands, and his shield charged full with electrical energy.
I assume for the confrontation drill, it's me and Ash versus you and Frost.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Cooperation, confrontation, sharing joint responsibility for tactical objectives with his teammates.
He suddenly feels his heart fill with enthusiasm.
Time to give them a surprise.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Four hours later
Rhodes Island Landship Training Grounds
Phew, hah...
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: He'd thought, for a moment then, to take his exploration of the hotlands as far as it would go. To succeed, or die trying.
But one day, after an additional gulp of the mysterious drink his safehouse friend had given him, one thing suddenly came to him,
in the gap between lucidity and psychedelia:
He was charging forward with his shield, desperately wanting results.
Yet he'd left his own squadmates far, far behind him.
Elias Kötz, Operator Blitz.
His duty, is to protect his team.
Give Frost the opportunity to set her traps.
Lead the enemy into Tachanka's muzzle.
Give advice to Ash.
But here he was going it alone, on this fraught search.
He realized. So now, he's come back.
I almost forgot how it felt the last time I stepped on a Welcome Mat.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Thank goodness you're not handling me the same way you handled those monsters, Frost.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Save your thanks for Ash. You'd be out of the match if it wasn't for that grenade.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: It's only a 2v2 drill. A lot of elements are going to be simpler than the real thing.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Tachanka, the drones spotted your setup too many times. I wouldn't have taken the risk otherwise.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: You wouldn't get the chance if we weren't using training rounds, Ash.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: That's why I breached here.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I hope we didn't get Ela and Iana sucked in too, when the four of us made our disappearing act.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I share the hope.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Unfortunately, we've got no way to form a full five-man specialist squad anymore.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Have you considered recruiting some new faces from this land?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: We're counter-terror special forces, not mercenaries under a military contractor.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Upholding peace is, and always has been, our sole mission.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: It's a shame how peace is even more fragile here than on Earth.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: That's why what we need to do now is survive, and find our way home.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: No matter how much fresh blood we have, they're not gonna come all the way with us, back to the very end.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Mm-hm.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: But is the difference really so vast?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Vaster than the gulfs between our own motherlands?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Haha.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: We used to have good old Six to clean up after our mess. Now? It's all down to us.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Maybe you could try and let yourself assimilate into this world a bit, Ash.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: We've been out of familiar surroundings for a long time.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: But after we adapt here, maybe we'll find some redeeming qualities after all, in this mess of a place.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Going home's very important, but it's not everything, Cohen.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Maybe first, before we find our way back, we can figure out how to live.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: How we keep going here in this place, even after we put down our guns.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I take it that's your opinion?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Just a suggestion.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: One from a friend.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I'll consider it.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Someone's coming.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: It's been a long time, Operators of Team Rainbow.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Welcome.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Welcome?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Wait, Ash, what's going on?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: We're here to train too.
attributes.name: Dur-nar

attributes.content: Or put another way, to be trained.
attributes.name: Fallon

attributes.content: Hello, everyone.
attributes.name: Grace

attributes.content: Now our new opponents have taken their places, let's get this started.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Ash, don't tell me...
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: We're Operators. We're Team Rainbow.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: I hope you're all up to the challenge.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: I'm in.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I'll switch Mats, then.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: How about you, Blitz?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: The answer is obvious.
I never choose to refuse, Ash.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I'm all ready.
attributes.name: Blitz
